description: Fall is here, and the perfect drink for a cool fall evening has arrived. This Autumn Apple Bourbon Fizz combines all of your favorite flavors in one glass: apples, cinnamon sugar will delight any taste buds! Plus, it's super simple to make- what more could you want?
keywords: Autumn Apple Bourbon Fizz Cocktail Recipe
How To Autumn Apple Bourbon Fizz
name: Autumn Apple Bourbon Fizz
recipeIngredient: 4 to 6 oz. Chilled ginger ale or ginger beer

recipeInstructions.name: In a small bowl, combine the cinnamon and sugar. Set aside. Wet the rim of an old-fashioned glass with orange wedge and dip in cinnamon mixture.

recipeInstructions.name: Add ice cubes to the glass. In a separate mug or cocktail shaker, add apple butter then bourbon over the top. Stir well until completely combined into one liquid.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour contents from the shaker into the prepared glass, slowly pouring ginger ale down the side of the container so it doesn't mix too much with the drink at the bottom.
